description: Application to clear condition 3 (Cleaning and Maintenance Schedule) of approved application DM2024/01558.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: Within one month of this consent being granted a scheme shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority providing details of a cleaning and maintenance schedule of all filters and odour abatement equipment.  This should include the setting up of a maintenance contract with a suitably competent contractor.  The scheme shall comply with the maintenance requirements stated in Control of Odour and Noise from Commercial Kitchen Exhaust Systems" published by EMAQ dated September 2018.Reason: To safeguard the amenities currently enjoyed by the occupants of the adjoining and/or dwellings in accordance with policy 29 of the Sutton Local Plan 2018.
